text: Wait, so you are not a part of Elden
Ring? Unlike you, we night farers get
our own standalone game. Well, I'm not
in it, so that's a downside. I
have time manipulation and a full
Remembrance story. I don't need some
marriage plot line. Ouch. Besides, I'm
Maria and the Firekeeper. So, you're
Lame. We also have a tall, sexy witch.
Just a shame that I am trapped in this
round table. So, what you're saying is
you can't touch grass. I will go
invisible and throw you two into the
damn ocean. No, wait. I can't swim.
